org.coding.MavenAssignment

Class ArgumentInterpreter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coding.MavenAssignment.ArgumentInterpreter

  • public class ArgumentInterpreter
extends Object
    Interprets what the user enters and reports that to Controller class using the static final int's below. E.g LS represents the user entering "ls". where "ls" means list directory contents.
    Author:
    Siddhartha Pattni
